alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:48AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay, central Walton and Washington Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 448 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Live Oak, Freeport, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Rock Hill, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Sylvania, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Greenhead and Bruce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
